# Actor and integration ideas

Got an idea for an Actor? It could be an AI agent, a web scraper, an automation tool, or an integration with another platform. Upvote the ideas here or submit your own and someone from the [Apify community](https://apify.com/partners/actor-developers) might develop it!

[Submit your idea ](https://apify.typeform.com/to/BNON8poB#source=ideas)[How ideas work](/ideas/how-it-works)

All Categories

Status

Popular

## [RedNote ScraperRedNote scraper helps you extract trending short-form videos, user data, and engagement metrics from RedNote. Get comprehensive analytics including view counts, engagemen…Completed46 upvotes](/ideas/rednote-scraper)

## [RedNote APIOur upcoming RedNote API integration will unlock platform data through advanced unofficial API endpoints. This integration will transform RedNote's data streams into valu…Open to develop45 upvotes](/ideas/rednote-api)

## [Taobao ScraperScrape product information from the Chinese online shopping platform Taobao. Extract product names, descriptions, prices, and images and export them to a myriad of databa…Completed44 upvotes](/ideas/taobao-scraper)

## [Wechat scraperScrape WeChat messages in bulk and extract complete details including name, description, profile picture, etc.Open to develop37 upvotes](/ideas/Wechat-scraper)

## [Bubble IntegrationIntegrate your Apify actors with Bubble and build comprehensive no-code web apps by connecting the two platforms.Open to develop31 upvotes](/ideas/bubble-integration)

## [Messenger ScraperUse our API to scrape data from the world's 2nd most popular messaging app. Extract profiles, messages, or pictures from Facebook Messenger and convert the results into H…Open to develop30 upvotes](/ideas/messenger-scraper)

## [Discord Website GeneratorAutomatically generate a static website from a Discord forum, to make the content available for the public and search engines. Make it easier for …Open to develop27 upvotes](/ideas/discord-website-generator)

## [Facebook Keyword ScraperSearch through the social media network Facebook based on a certain keyword and export resulting statuses in JSON, CSV, Excel, XML, or as an HTML table.Open to develop24 upvotes](/ideas/facebook-keyword-scraper)

## [Zalo ScraperZalo is a free message, call, and social media application very popular in Vietnam. The goal of this Actor is to extract data from Zalo profiles and conversations.Open to develop19 upvotes](/ideas/zalo-scraper)

## [Gas Prices ScraperA tool that lets you easily find the cheapest gas stations in your area or explore the lowest gas prices across the US — all without endless searching. A Gas Stations Scr…Open to develop19 upvotes](/ideas/gas-prices-scraper)

## [Truecaller ScraperExtract Calling ID data through Truecaller.com. Input phone number, and output information crowdsourced from users, public directories, and other sources. Export your dat…Open to develop18 upvotes](/ideas/truecaller-scraper)

## [Scrapy Cloud RunnerRun Scrapy spiders in the cloud via Apify. Host your Scrapy spiders written in Python on the Apify platform. Automate, schedul…Open to develop17 upvotes](/ideas/scrapy-cloud-runner)

## [Cypress Cloud RunnerRun your JavaScript-based automation and testing scripts built with Cypress framework on the cloud. Automate and schedule your runs in Apify Console and connect them to o…Open to develop17 upvotes](/ideas/cypress-scraper)

## [Python ScraperScrape the web using one of the most popular programming languages for web scraping - Python. Use this actor as a template for creating web scraping projects with various…Open to develop17 upvotes](/ideas/python-scraper)

## [Zoominfo ScraperScrape contact information and company profiles, use the results for customer research and target lists with the Zoominfo Scraper, the go-to Market Software. Use the scra…Open to develop16 upvotes](/ideas/zoominfo-scraper)

## [Laravel IntegrationIntegrate the web application framework with the Apify platform to simplify the building of automation and web scraping APIs.Open to develop15 upvotes](/ideas/laravel-integration)

## [Midjourney ScraperBy inputting specific prompts, users can generate a wide range of art and save the resulting JPEGs in a key-value store. Additionally, the scraper provides options to exp…Completed15 upvotes](/ideas/midjourney-scraper)

## [Beatiful Soup Cloud RunnerRun your Python applications built with the Beautiful Soup library in the cloud. Use this actor to run, schedule, and modify parse trees and web scraping or automation ta…Open to develop14 upvotes](/ideas/beautiful-soup-cloud-runner)

## [Weibo ScraperScrape Weibo content and extract likes, comments, and shares of posts, images, and videos published. Export the data as a structured dataset.Completed14 upvotes](/ideas/Weibo-scraper)

## [News ScraperUse this actor to scrape detailed data from articles on any popular news website, such as BBC, CNN, and Bloomberg. Download extracted data as an HTML table, JSON, CSV, Ex…Completed13 upvotes](/ideas/news-scraper)

## [Video Download Link CrawlerThe Video Download Link Crawler allows you to find and download videos from websites by simply providing a start URL. This Actor will crawl through all accessible sites f…Open to develop13 upvotes](/ideas/video-download-link-crawler)

## [Puppeteer Cloud RunnerRun your Puppeteer-based applications on the cloud by implementing them into Apify Console. Schedule, test, and automate your APIs built via the testing library on the cl…Open to develop13 upvotes](/ideas/puppeteer-cloud-runner)

## [Dataset DownloadDownload any dataset from the Apify platform automatically and in any format you want. Use this actor along with a Dataset toolbox automation tool.Open to develop13 upvotes](/ideas/dataset-download)
